caption.p: Effects of EOC addition on growth performance and rumen fermentation parameters of goats. Effect of EOC addition on average daily weight (ADG) (kg/d) ( a), pH in rumen fluid ( b), ammonia ( c), total VFA ( d), acetate ( e), propionate ( f), and butyrate ( g) content of rumen microbial fermentation. Effect of all three treatments on rumen villus height ( h) and villus width ( i) (um). j H&E staining of rumen villus structure of different groups. * P < 0.05
